snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry will meet with King Abdullah in his first stop on a nine-day trip to the Middle East, Europe and North Africa.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry will begin a nine-day trip to the Middle East, Europe and North Africa by stopping for talks with King Abdullah in Saudi Arabia; Abdullah, major ally, is angered over what he sees as Obama administration failures in Syria, Egypt, Palestinian-Israeli conflict and relations with Iran.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry will meet with King Abdullah in his first stop on a nine-day trip to the Middle East, Europe and North Africa.

headline.main: Kerry to Visit Saudi Arabia to Smooth Relations
headline.print_headline: Kerry Will Visit Saudi Arabia in an Attempt to Patch Up Frayed Relations

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
